208900.「すごい！\n <%sM_ACTIVE_SLIME>ちゃんの 姿が\n 変わった:

I'm a little jealous...

208916.「スライムレース場へ ようこそ！\n<br>\n「私は スライムレース育成係のブ:
Welcome to the Slime Races!
My name is Breda, and I'm a slime trainer. A top-notch one at that, despite my looks. I manage slimes here.
Slime Races let you train a slime of your choosing to race and win!
You don't need a fellow monster in advance. I can introduce you to a number of friendly slimes. Choose "Scouting" and we can start.
...ahem. Well then...

208917.<se_nots System 35>\n「えー！ ……わかったわ。\n オーナ:
<se_nots System 35>
Huh?! ...I understand.
You can be a slime owner anytime, so please
come back if you're interested.
<break>

208918.「そうこなくっちゃ！\n オーナーになると 最大３匹のスライムを\n 同時に管理:
That's what I'm talking about! As a slime owner, you can manage up to 3 slimes.
Let's scout the first slime you'll train right now!
I'm acquainted with many slimes. I can introduce you to one of your liking.

208919.「<%sM_ACTIVE_SLIME>ちゃんは 今回のレースを\n 走り切って:

<end>

Because <%sM_ACTIVE_SLIME>'s level has
risen from this race, it will be given an
additional <%dM_FEED_LEFT> feed.
<bw_break>

208922.「すごい！ <%sM_ACTIVE_SLIME>ちゃんは\n あなたの育成のおか:
Amazing! <%sM_ACTIVE_SLIME> has grown into a fully fledged slime thanks to your training.
A fully fledged slime can't gain any more levels, so please be aware of that.
Because <%sM_ACTIVE_SLIME>'s level has risen from this race, it will be given an additional <%dM_FEED_LEFT> feed.

208923.「どんなスライムを スカウトしたいのかしら？\n 種族とカラーを 教えてね。\n:
Which slime do you want to scout? Please
choose its species and color.
<break>

208924.「どんな子をスカウトするか 決めていないけど\n 決定内容をキャンセルしても い:

<yesno2><break>

208925.「スカウトするのは \n この子で いいかしら？\n<yesno><break>:
Is this the slime you'd like to scout?
<yesno><break>

208926.「<%sM_ACTIVE_SLIME>ちゃん ステキな名前じゃない！\n きっと:
I think <%sM_ACTIVE_SLIME> is a great
name!
I'm sure you'll like it.
<end>

208928.「<%sM_ACTIVE_SLIME>ちゃんの\n パートナーになった 記念に\:
In commemoration of becoming partners with <%sM_ACTIVE_SLIME>, I'll let them eat feed three times.
Your slime will grow when it is fed. The type of feed determines which stats will grow. Choose whichever feed suits your style best.

208929.<speed=0>\n申し訳ありませんが\nその名前は 入力できません。\n<e:

208930.「ちゃんと 名前を考えてあげて！\n<bw_break>:

208931.「スライムは レベルが上がると\n 追加で エサを食べさせることができるわ。\n:
When your slime's level increases, you can give it more feed to increases its stats.
If you choose "Enter Training Race", you can raise its level to a maximum of 10. Keep on training them!

<end>

208942.「参加させたいレースを 選んでね。\n マスターで １着を取ると\n 特訓レース:
Choose the race you'd like to participate in.
If you place first in the Master race, a
special race will become available!

<break>

<yesno><break>

208946.「わかったわ！\n <%sM_ACTIVE_SLIME>ちゃんが １着を取れるよ:
Okay! Choose <%sM_ACTIVE_SLIME>'s

<end>

208947.「すごいわ！ １着 おめでとう！\n カジノコイン <%nM_GOT_POINT:
Amazing! Congratulations on first place!
I'll give you <%dM_GOT_POINT> Casino Tokens.
<bw_break>

208949.「うーん！ 惜しかったわね。２着よ！\n カジノコイン <%nM_GOT_POI:
Good! You placed in second! I'll give you

<bw_break>

208950.「あらら 残念。３着だったわ。\n カジノコイン <%nM_GOT_POINT>:
Hmm, sorry. You placed third. Here's <%dM_GOT_POINT>
Casino Tokens.
<bw_break>

208951.「<%sM_GRADE>で １着を取ったので\n <%sM_GRADE_UP>に:
You can now participate in <%sM_GRADE_UP>
since you placed first in <%sM_GRADE>!
Please give it a try!
<end>

208953.「おめでとう！\n マスターⅡで １着を取ったので\n マスターⅠが 解放された:
Congratulations! Master Ⅰ is now available since you placed first in Master Ⅱ!
If you place first in Master Ⅰ, you'll be able to freely choose your slime's skills from any of the skills it's able to learn.
However, <%sM_ACTIVE_SLIME> can only participate in Master Ⅰ races from now on, so please make sure to remember that.

208954.「新しい子を管理する 部屋を\n 選んであげて。\n<break>:
Please choose a room to manage your new slime.
<break>

208956.「そこはもう 別の子が使ってるわ。\n 新しい子をスカウトするなら \n 他の部:
That room is already occupied. Please choose
a different room, or part with one of your
current slimes.
<bw_break>

208957.「スライムレースは スライムを\n 自分好みに育てながら \n 勝利を目指す レ:
Slime Races are races where you can train a slime to your liking to win!
We've prepared 5 different levels of races, from Beginner Ⅲ to Master Ⅰ.
If you place first in a race, you'll be able to take part in the next rank race.
I'm in charge of slime training, but the person next to me can arrange friend races or a limited time event that gives good money.

208958.「スライムのつよさは ４つの能力\n スピード ジャンプ率 スタミナ 最大ＭＰに:
A slime's stats are divided into four categories: Speed, Jump Rate, Stamina, and Max MP.
Speed increases how fast a slime runs, while Jump Rate causes your slime to jump more often and dodge traps.
Stamina causes your slime to get tired less often, and Max MP will allow your slime to use more skills during a race.
Each stat can be raised by leveling up and feeding your slime special feed.
However, a stat won't improve unless it advances to a higher rank.
Also, keep in mind that stats can no longer be increased when a slime's level reaches 10.

208959.「スライムレースでは レースが始まる前に\n どこで どのとくぎを使うか\n さ:
In a Slime Race, you can choose when you'd like to use your skills.
The leading slime will use a skill each time it passes one of the four points.
The slimes behind the one in first place will use their skills at the same time as the leading slime.
A slime can only know one passive skill, but they are always active and can be very powerful.
During Training Races, you can view the skills your opponents will use, so be sure to make good use of it.

208960.「マスターⅠで １着を取ると\n そのスライムが習得可能な 全とくぎの中から\n:
If you place first in Master Ⅰ, you'll be able to freely choose your slime's skills from any of the skills it's able to learn.
However, your slime will only participate in Master Ⅰ races from then on, so please make sure to remember that.

208962.「何について 説明する？\n<break>:
What do you need help with?
<break>

208963.「他にも何か 説明が必要かしら？\n<break>:

<break>

<%sM_ACTIVE_SLIME> off your hands.

249948.「あら <%sM_ACTIVE_SLIME>ちゃんは\n <%sM_TOKUGI:
Hey, <%sM_ACTIVE_SLIME> has <%sM_TOKUGI> learned.
It can only know one passive skill at a time.
If you want it to learn <%sM_TOKUGI_NEW>, it'll have to forget the passive skill that it already knows. Choose the skill to forget.

249982.「<%sM_TOKUGI_NEW>を 覚えるには 今 覚えている\n 常に効果が:
In order to learn <%sM_TOKUGI_NEW>, it will
have to forget the passive skill it already

<break>

283065.「スライムレース場へ ようこそ！\n ここでは スライムの育成ができるわ。\n<:
Welcome to the Slime Races! You can train your slimes here.
Oh? I haven't told you the news yet. Let's see...
A new type of slime has been added: the Drake Slime! I guess it's got some pretty powerful skills.
Oh, also... It seems the Slime Stack's stats have changed, so be sure to give it a good look.
The strength of some skills and their MP costs seemed to have changed too, so experiment raising different slimes to see what's new.
...And that's it for the new information. Now then...
